channel.title: rpath, ubuntu on Og Maciel's Journal
channel.description: Recent content in rpath, ubuntu on Og Maciel's Journal

item.title: Let the good times roll!
item.description: Just a quick note since I still have no internet at home and have been busy trying to catch up at my new job: North Carolina rocks!!! Gorgeous weather! NO TRAFFIC JAMS! Eastern Carolina BBQ is awsome! Python all day long is what the doctor recommended! The rPath crew know how to make one feel at home! ;) Jamocha!!! Fresh ground coffee!!! Got sponsored to go to the Ubuntu Developer Summit in Mountain View, CA!
